channel.title: Autoers = owned?
channel.description:
Today we see jagex have made an update to rune ess mining.
20 April 2006 - Rune Essence adjustment Today we have made an adjustment to rune essence mining due to players breaking rule 7 and rule 12, using macros to mine the rune essence and then selling it. As you are probably aware we have various systems in place to detect people breaking rule 7 and ban them. These systems work very effectively at detecting people breaking this rule, and make macroing a really bad way to try and train a high level character. The problem we are now solving is not a problem with our macro detection systems which are still working well, but rather a problem with banning being an ineffective punishment against abusers who only use very low level accounts, and who have no intention of ever playing the game properly. Over the last few weeks we have banned literally hundreds of accounts a day for macroing at the rune essence mine. However the bans were ineffective as the abusers could just create more low level accounts that they didn't care about to mine more. We also track trades so we can ban the recipiant of the illegally obtained items, but the abusers in this case were swapping the runes for gp, and then selling the gp for real world money on auction sites. Of course the person buying the gp for real world money gets banned, because we track the money they received in an unbalanced trade to a macro account, but the seller doesn't care that their customers get banned shortly after, as they have their real world money by then. The fundamental problem is that rune essence was one of the few areas of the game which could be used to generate a reasonable amount of RuneScape money on a 'throwaway' low level free account. Normally to earn large amounts of money quickly you need to level up an account first, and then of course you care if it gets banned so our normal deterrant is effective. We have therefore split rune essence to have 2 grades. Normal essence can only be used to make the six basic runes, whereas pure essence can be used to make any rune. You can mine both types of essence at the same place as before. The kind of essence you receive is automatically decided when you mine the rock. You will always get pure essence only if your mining is over 30 and you are on a members' world, otherwise you will get normal essence. As a one-off event whilst we introduce this, existing essence in your bank and inventory will have been automatically converted to pure essence if you are a member or have other members-only items in your bank. Since free players can only craft the six basic runes anyway, the normal essence is just as good for its intended purpose of letting free players do low level rune crafting. However it is not so useful for selling to members who want to make law and nature runes (who we believe buy the vast majority of rune essence in Runescape) which should reduce its price significantly and make it a much less appealing proposition for real world traders. The only people who should be significantly affected by this are players mining very large amounts of essence on free accounts purely to sell to members. There are better way of making money on high level free accounts anyway, so this change should only really affect players trying to making large amounts of money on a low level free account - which is of course the exact idea. We would also like to yet again remind our players NOT to break rule 12 and be tempted to buy RuneScape gold for real world money. Nearly all the gold being offered for sale in this way was generated by cheating on 'throwaway' accounts. If you buy it not only are you encouraging further cheating, but you run the very real risk of being banned yourself as the money you receive is dirty money and will be tracked. Again we have banned countless players for breaking rule 12 and fuelling this problem, and will continue to do so. We hope most players will agree we shouldn't let rule breakers spoil this game, and we are determined to not let them do so. As well as banning, where necessary we will also make minimal changes to the game to make rule breaking unviable
What are your opinions on this, do u think this update seriously fucks up autoers? I reckon it does :(

rofl...this update did nothing to autoers and fucked up guys like me who had 1000k + ess in bank to do my nats on main and now have to buy the stupid "pure ess"

All of youre ess would have been converted if you were making nats because you have to be a member to make nats

item.title: Autoers = owned?
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

Dingo212:

Listen up people,

Normal ess prices wont drop or something...so far we are good to go. The only thing is, if you are a member AND WANT TO CRAFT NAT/LAW/DEATH then you need pure ess...which means pure ess will go up...nothing big to us..or gonna stop us...infact they are receiving lots of complaints from their 'legit' players.

Logically looking...the normal ess will be around 35ea...which we can keep doing. But pure ess will be around 70ea. Nothing lost here...

JagEx just pushed a 5 x 20 dildo up its own arse

[br][size=1]Posted at: April 21, 2006, 09:56:13 am[/size][hr][quote author=yna_ajhear5 link=topic=1662.msg16051#msg16051 date=1145620130]
you should be complaining about the economy.

Just wait till nats are 500ea.

And regular ess sells for 2ea.

...Just wait. That, my friend, it the Runescape economy.

why would regular ess 2ea? nats = 500ea...reasonable..

But think ppl...

Because of this...lots of rcing ppl will switch to airs...(so cheap ess)

Because of that...the demand will be there...so the normal ess will be up and around 30ea...

the only thing gonna go up is pure ess prices and high lvl rune prices[/quote]

Normal ess will go down quite a bit. Unless you have a stupidly high runecrafting level you won't make much off selling normal runes. In 1 year of F2P, my friend got 27 runecrafting. In 1 night of using Mad Cow's air crafter, I got 37.

Basically, pure ess can only make runes up to body. Now, using data from tip.it, you need either 35 runecrafting to make double fires, 40gp for both of them, or 70 for 3 times fires for 60gp, or 1680 per load. Since no one really buys earths and waters in bulk we'll exclude them. 77 Runecrafting needed for 8 times airs, or 4480 per load, about the same or a little bit more with minds, after awhile no one will need air/mind/water/earth/fire runes because all the autoers move on to crafting them and we have bulk, members ess won't run out for awhile since alot of it was drop traded so in a month or 2, all the members ess will be dropping so low there won't be enough pure ess, this is where supply and demand comes in. Not enough supplyers means the demand goes up, the price goes up and if it gets too bad people will become members to mine ess to sell for even more profit. Either that or too many people will complain and it will go back to normal.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Exernet Exernet

@Exernet wrote:

Regular essence is pointless, don't you understand that the essence economy relies ONLY on P2P. F2P runecrafters are maybe 5% of total essence sales. Nobody will pay a reasonable price for the regular essence, as they can just buy the runes themselves cheaper. Essence autoing is over, just face it.

item.title: Autoers = owned?
item.dc:creator: @BlackThursday BlackThursday
item.description:
@BlackThursday wrote:

Calm down everyone. Your all complaining how you cant sell your ess anymore. Of course you can sell you ess because mages need RUNECRAFT skill to even thin kabout makin higher runes. The market will take a hit yes, but we do as MissSilabsoft said still have the Moparironbanker and such (btw it could use some tweaking).

So the way i see it one of two things will happen:
1) Jagex keeps bein bitchy to the non-mems and people start switching to members and jagex makes alooot of $, at which point people will start to accuse them of extortion or sumthin like that.

2) keep bein bitches to non-mems and everyone goes to iron and copper mining and they lock that up too in which case everyone starts to bitch and Jagex takes a gigantic finacial hit.

Add or correct to this. I jus want to see them suffer for this pure ess shit.

And Akriam, keep workin on that code.. That'll be the day jagex shits their pants.. over 120 non-members walkin around wit pure ess that they didn't buy or sell from anyone.And on the subject of them stalkin ur acct and the people you trade to:Jagex couldn't track a lawnmover through an overgrown field. Dumbasses.
